titleInfo.title: Improving Health Programs for Low-Income Youths

mods.abstract: This report updates and expands guidance on adolescent health for state Medicaid Early and Periodic Screening, Diagnosis, and Treatment (EPSDT) programs developed by federal officials in the 1980s. It aims to help policy makers, public health administrators, and community leaders understand legislative changes and their relationship to creating better health programs.
mods.note: The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

location.physicalLocation: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections
